item.title: 中央银行的独立性是一个光谱
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: Uniswap 实验室总裁拉德四年后离开 DeFi 公司
item.description: Uniswap Labs 总裁兼首席运营官玛丽-凯瑟琳-拉德（Mary-Catherine Lader）于 2021 年离开贝莱德，帮助领导以太坊上最大的去中心化交易平台。【原文：Uniswap Labs President and Chief Operating Officer Mary-Catherine Lader, who left BlackRock in 2021 to help lead the largest decentralized trading platform on Ethereum, has exited the firm.】

item.title: 美国房价正在失去动力，多数大市场低于峰值
item.description: 根据洲际交易所（Intercontinental Exchange）的最新数据，美国房地产市场已接近停滞，全国排名前 100 位的房地产市场中，有一半以上市场的房价已低于峰值。【原文：The US housing market is close to stalling out, with prices in more than half the country’s top 100 housing markets now below their peak, according to the latest data from Intercontinental Exchange.】

item.title: 卡尼暗示将继续征收关税，并认为与美国的谈判正在加强
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）表示，他相信与美国的贸易谈判将 "加剧"，但他承认几乎没有证据表明特朗普政府愿意达成一项完全放弃关税的协议。【原文：Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney said he believes trade negotiations with the US will “intensify” but acknowledged there’s little evidence the Trump administration is willing to cut a deal that would completely drop tariffs.】

item.title: 巴里克考虑向发现银矿出售金矿
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining Corp.【原文：Barrick Mining Corp. is in advanced talks to sell its last Canadian gold mine to Discovery Silver Corp., according to people familiar with the matter, as the firms seek to capitalize on the soaring price of the precious metal.】

item.title: 华尔街认为美国过度依赖发行国债存在风险
item.description: 华尔街的策略师们警告说，如果财政部更多地依靠发行票据来为政府赤字融资，将面临潜在的风险。【原文：Wall Street strategists are warning of potential risks should the Treasury rely more on bill issuance to finance the government deficit.】

item.title: Oklo 聘请 Kiewit 在爱达荷实验室建造小型核电站
item.description: Oklo 公司已经选定了一家承包商来建造其第一座核电站，这表明这家能源初创企业在提供新型反应堆的努力中势头正劲。【原文：Oklo Inc. has selected a contractor to build its first nuclear power plant, a sign the energy startup is gaining momentum in its efforts to deliver a new type of reactor.】

item.title: 伊马拉说：养老基金向房地产倾斜损害津巴布韦股市
item.description: 津巴布韦最大的独立资产管理公司称，养老基金对房地产的过度投资对津巴布韦股市的表现产生了负面影响。【原文：Zimbabwe’s stock-market performance is being negatively impacted by pension funds’ overexposure to property, according to the country’s largest independently-owned asset manager.】

item.title: 安哥拉推迟出售欧洲债券计划，转向国内借贷
item.description: 安哥拉推迟了今年出售欧元债券的计划，理由是市场波动打击了投资者的信心。【原文：Angola delayed a plan to sell eurobonds this year, citing market volatility that’s undermined investor confidence.】

item.title: Meta 被罚 2 亿欧元后面临新的欧盟科技反垄断冲突
item.description: 在 2 亿欧元（约合 2.32 亿美元）的罚款未能使 Facebook 和 Instagram 遵守一项严厉的新数字法律之后，Meta Platforms Inc.【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is headed for another clash with the European Union after a €200 million ($232 million) fine failed to bring Facebook and Instagram into compliance with a tough new digital law.】

item.title: 英国央行曼恩警告失业忧虑令储蓄率居高不下
item.description: 英国央行利率制定者凯瑟琳-曼（Catherine Mann）警告说，失业担忧和不断上涨的账单正在促使英国家庭建立 "雨天基金"，因为储蓄利率仍然远高于科维德事件之前，这阻碍了经济的发展。【原文：Bank of England rate-setter Catherine Mann warned that unemployment fears and rising bills are prompting UK households to build a “rainy day fund” as the economy is held back by savings rates that remain much higher than before Covid.】

item.title: 美国司法部结束 Polymarket 调查，加密货币投注在特朗普治下获胜
item.description: 就在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）领导的白宫试图推动该行业发展之际，美国对加密博彩平台 Polymarket 的两项调查在拜登政府执政的最后几天全面展开，现在已经被叫停。【原文：A pair of US investigations into crypto-betting platform Polymarket that went full-throttle in the waning days of the Biden administration are now being shut down just as Donald Trump’s White House seeks to give the industry a boost.】

item.title: 比特币追逐美国梦，推动房贷打破常规
item.description: 曾经被一小撮加密货币信仰者视为边缘幻想的东西，现在正在被美国住房市场核心的政府资助实体进行初步研究。【原文：What was once dismissed as a fringe fantasy by a niche band of crypto believers is now being tentatively examined by the government-sponsored entities at the core of the US housing market.】

item.title: 法国提议取消两个公共假日以解决预算缺口问题
item.description: 法国总理弗朗索瓦-巴伊鲁（Francois Bayrou）提议取消两个国家法定节假日，这是为修复公共财政而做出的重大努力的一部分，很可能会在秋季引起议会的反弹。【原文：French Prime Minister Francois Bayrou proposed scrapping two national holidays, part of a drastic effort to repair public finances likely to prompt a parliamentary backlash in the fall.】

item.title: 意大利梅洛尼表示应不惜一切代价避免与美国爆发贸易战
item.description: 意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）表示，欧洲国家应竭尽全力避免与美国爆发贸易战。【原文：European countries should do everything they can to avoid a trade war with the US, said Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni.】

item.title: 据说 Helvetia 和 Baloise 将向麦肯锡寻求合并帮助
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Helvetia Holding AG 和 Baloise Holding AG 聘请了战略咨询公司麦肯锡，为今年欧洲最大的保险交易提供建议。【原文：Helvetia Holding AG and Baloise Holding AG hired strategy consultant McKinsey for advice on Europe’s biggest insurance deal this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根大通杰米-戴蒙称私人信贷热潮可能已经达到顶峰
item.description: 这家美国最大的银行并不急于在华尔街最热门的市场上收购一家公司。【原文：The biggest US bank isn’t itching to buy a company in Wall Street’s hottest market.】

item.title: 股票专家视预测为政策混乱时代的 "必要之恶
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统等待 1 月份第二次就职之际，高盛集团首席美国股票策略师大卫-J-科斯汀（David J. Kostin）清楚地认识到这对股市意味着什么：又是稳健上涨的一年。【原文：As President Donald Trump awaited his second inauguration in January, David J. Kostin, Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s chief US equity strategist, had a clear view of what that would mean for stocks: another year of solid gains.】

item.title: 法国总理称债务飙升令国家岌岌可危
item.description: 法国总理弗朗索瓦-贝鲁（Francois Bayrou）周二在阐述明年大幅缩减预算赤字的计划时说，法国正处于债务持续膨胀的悬崖边缘。【原文：France is on the cliff edge as its debt continues to balloon, Prime Minister Francois Bayrou said on Tuesday as he set out plans to sharply narrow the budget deficit next year.】

item.title: 合作伙伴集团正在商谈将蓝精灵玩具制造商移交给债权人的事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Partners Group 旗下的 Schleich 公司正在商讨债务重组事宜，私募股权公司可能会将这家德国玩具公司的钥匙交给债权人。【原文：Partners Group-owned Schleich is discussing a debt restructuring that could see the private equity firm hand over the keys of the German toy company to its creditors, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: Stellantis 将停止对氢气合资企业的投资
item.description: Stellantis NV 将撤回对米其林和 Forvia SE 的氢能汽车合资企业的支持，因为该汽车制造商削减了对这一新兴技术的投资，从而使该项目的未来面临风险。【原文：Stellantis NV will withdraw its support for a joint hydrogen-vehicle venture with Michelin and Forvia SE as the automaker cuts its exposure to the fledgling technology, putting the project’s future at risk.】

item.title: 加纳采取行动对冲金价以保护储备积累
item.description: 加纳央行行长约翰逊-阿西亚马（Johnson Asiama）表示，加纳正在制定一项黄金出口价格对冲计划，以保护央行的外汇储备免受未来波动的影响。【原文：Ghana is working on a program to hedge the price of gold exports as it seeks to shield earnings that have bolstered the central bank’s foreign reserves from future volatility, Governor of the Bank of Ghana Johnson Asiama said.】

item.title: 阿联酋股票销售重拾势头，沙特面临估值考验
item.description: 进入 2025 年下半年，阿拉伯联合酋长国的股票资本市场又出现了新的发展势头，而希望出售股票的沙特阿拉伯公司则面临投资者对估值的谨慎态度。【原文：The United Arab Emirates is seeing renewed momentum in equity capital markets heading into the second half of 2025, while Saudi Arabian firms eying share sales face investor caution over valuations.】

item.title: 特朗普称与印尼达成协议，但未提供详细信息
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他已与印尼达成协议，但没有提供协议内容的任何具体细节。【原文：US President Donald Trump said he reached a deal with Indonesia, without providing any specifics of what is included in the accord.】

item.title: 巴黎人报》称法国总理将提议削减两个公共假日
item.description: 据《巴黎人报》周二报道，法国总理弗朗索瓦-巴伊鲁（Francois Bayrou）将提议取消两个公共假日，作为修复国家公共财政计划的一部分。【原文：French Prime Minister Francois Bayrou will propose abolishing two public holidays as part of a plan to repair the country’s public finances, Le Parisien newspaper reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 人工智能需要新动力，南方公司巨额支出计划获批
item.description: 佐治亚州监管机构批准了一项计划，为南方公司增加高达 150 亿美元的开支敞开大门，以便为数据中心、新工厂和电动汽车提供预计激增的电力。【原文：Georgia regulators approved a plan that opens the door for Southern Co. to boost spending by as much as $15 billion to deliver a projected surge of electricity for data centers, new factories and electric vehicles.】

item.description: 以下是周二发布的 6 月份消费者价格指数报告的五大要点。单击此处查看我们的 TOPLive 博客：【原文：Here are five key takeaways from the June consumer price index report, released Tuesday. Click here for our TOPLive blog:】

item.title: 加拿大房屋销售上升，经济在贸易战中保持稳定
item.description: 加拿大的房屋销售连续第二个月增长，反映出买家信心的增强，因为加拿大经济似乎摆脱了美国关税的影响。【原文：Home sales in Canada rose for a second straight month, reflecting a boost in buyer confidence as the economy appeared to shrug off the impact of US tariffs.】

item.title: PredictIt 称可根据 CFTC 协议扩大政治交易
item.description: 美国最早的政治博彩平台之一 PredictIt 表示，它与商品期货交易委员会达成了一项新协议，允许其扩大业务。【原文：PredictIt, one of the original US politics-betting platforms, said it reached a new agreement with the Commodity Futures Trading Commission to allow it expand its operations.】

item.title: 伯恩利俱乐部老板与中国玩具公司就西班牙人队达成协议
item.description: 英超球队伯恩利俱乐部（Burnley FC）的所有者与巴塞罗那西班牙人足球俱乐部（RCD Espanyol de Barcelona SAD）的中国支持者达成协议，两家足球俱乐部将成为新的多俱乐部结构的一部分。【原文：The owners of Premier League team Burnley FC have struck a deal with the Chinese backers of RCD Espanyol de Barcelona SAD, with the two football clubs becoming part of a new multi-club structure.】
